## genus
* graphclasses.org: [genus](https://www.graphclasses.org/classes/par_23.html)
* [â†—](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Genus_(mathematics)#Graph_theory) The genus of a graph is the minimal integer $n$ such that the graph can be drawn without crossing itself on a sphere with $n$ handles.
